Test Case Description: Verify that the homepage loads successfully
Test Steps: 1. Open the browser. 2. Navigate to the homepage URL

Test Case Description: Check if the cart updates correctly when an item is added
Test Steps: 1. Select an item. 2. Click "Add to Cart". 3. Verify the cart icon and total update accordingly
Expected Result: Cart should display the selected item with the correct quantity and price

Test Case Description: Validate error handling for an empty cart
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to the cart page with no items. 2. Observe the displayed message
Expected Result: Your cart is empty message should be displayed
Actual Result: Your cart is empty message displayed

Test Case Description: Ensure proper redirection for invalid product URLs
Test Steps: 1. Enter a non-existent product URL. 2. Observe the response
Expected Result: User should see a Product Not Found page

Test Case Description: Test search functionality with valid inputs
Test Steps: 1. Enter "chair" in the search bar. 2. Press Enter/Search button
Expected Result: Relevant products matching the search term should be displayed

Test Case Description: Test search functionality with invalid inputs
Test Steps: 1. Enter "randominvalidinput" in the search bar. 2. Press Enter/Search button
Expected Result: No results should be displayed with a user-friendly message

Test Steps: 1. Open the website on a mobile device. 2. Test the layout and functionality
Expected Result: Layout and functionality should work seamlessly on mobile devices
Remarks: Fix alignment of the cart button on mobile view

Test Case Description: Verify loading state for search results
Test Steps: 1. Initiate a search. 2. Observe the loading indicator
Expected Result: Loading indicator should display during the fetch operation

Test Case Description: Validate API response time for the product page
Test Steps: 1. Open a product detail page. 2. Measure the response time
Remarks: Optimize the API response for faster loading

Test Case Description: Ensure fallback UI for failed API calls
Test Steps: 1. Simulate a failed API response. 2. Observe the displayed UI
Expected Result: Error loading data. Please try again. fallback message should display
Actual Result: Error loading data. Please try again. message displayed
